mapper.sql: select place_id, parent_place_id, (select distinct pp.name from zx_place pp where pp.place_id =p.`parent_place_id` ) parentPlaceName, place_code, place_type, scene, (SELECT DISTINCT sdd.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data sdd WHERE sdd.dict_type ='place_type' AND sdd.dict_value=p.`scene` ) sceneName, name, sname, address, province, (select distinct a.pname from sys_area a where a.id =p.`province` ) provinceName, city, (select distinct a.pname from sys_area a where a.id =p.`city` ) cityName, county, (select distinct a.pname from sys_area a where a.id =p.`county` ) countyName, lon, lat, packet, tissue_price, tissue_len, repair_id, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =p.`repair_id` ) repairName, supply_id, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =p.`supply_id` ) supplyName, operator_id, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =p.`operator_id` ) operatorName, owner_id, (select distinct u.user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id =p.`owner_id` ) ownerName, (select count(1) from zx_device zd where zd.place_id =p.`place_id` and zd.status='02' ) as device_count, ct_bank,ct_account, ct_receiver, ct_phone, ct_identity, ct_rate, status, del_flag, note, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,service_point, (select distinct zr.repair_name from zx_repair zr where zr.repair_id =p.`service_point` ) servicePointName, (SELECT DISTINCT za.agent_name FROM zx_agent za WHERE za.del_flag!=2 AND za.city =p.`city` AND za.county IS NULL) agentLevel1, (SELECT DISTINCT za.agent_name FROM zx_agent za WHERE za.del_flag!=2 AND za.city =p.`city` AND za.county =p.`county` ) agentLevel2 from zx_place p
mapper.insert:
insert into zx_place
place_id, parent_place_id, place_code, place_type, scene, name, sname, address, province, city, county, lon, lat, packet, tissue_price, tissue_len, service_point, repair_id, supply_id, operator_id, owner_id, device_count, ct_bank, ct_account, ct_receiver, ct_phone, ct_identity, ct_rate, status, del_flag, note, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,
#{placeId}, #{parentPlaceId}, #{placeCode}, #{placeType}, #{scene}, #{name}, #{sname}, #{address}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{lon}, #{lat}, #{packet}, #{tissuePrice}, #{tissueLen}, #{servicePoint}, #{repairId}, #{supplyId}, #{operatorId}, #{ownerId}, #{deviceCount}, #{ctBank}, #{ctAccount}, #{ctReceiver}, #{ctPhone}, #{ctIdentity}, #{ctRate}, #{status}, #{delFlag}, #{note}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime},
mapper.delete:
delete from zx_place where place_id in
#{placeId}
mapper.select: select place_id, parent_place_id, place_code, name, sname from zx_place
select count(1) from zx_place where place_code=#{placeCode}
SELECT place_code FROM zx_place WHERE county=#{county} ORDER BY place_id DESC LIMIT 1
